title: NFL Preseason Week 1 Recap, Weekend Picks (Football 08/10)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson and John Breech to break down the action from Week 1's preseason games on Thursday night, including the performances of Baker Mayfield and Tyrod Taylor, the good and bad of Bills quarterback Josh Allen, Derrius Guice's injury and the latest updates, Andrew Luck's performance for the Colts and Lamar Jackson improving in his preseason work. The guys also pick teams or players they are ALL IN -- Breech promises to get a tattoo when the Bengals win a playoff game this year, Brinson is moving his family to Nashville when the Titans win the Super Bowl and Wilson has to tell everyone his creepy fantasy team name that he used to draft Saquon Barkley. All that plus much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: Ryan Wilson and John Breech join Will Brinson to break down all the action from Week 1's preseason games on Thursday night, including the Browns QBs, Andrew Luck's return and Derrius Guice's injury.
